name: featurerecommender
title: Feature Recommender
description: This addon recommends Firefox interface features when they are needed. It is a temporary experimental addon installed.
author: Kamyar Ardekani <kamyar@mozilla.com>

preferences.name: isTest
preferences.title: Is it a test or field deployment.

preferences.name: clean_install
preferences.title: Whether or not all the preferences should be reset upon installation.

preferences.name: cleanup_on_death
preferences.title: Whether the preferences should be cleaned up when the addon is killed

preferences.name: timer.tick_length_s
preferences.title: Length of a tick in seconds

preferences.name: timer.silence_length_s
preferences.title: Length of the silence period in seconds

preferences.name: timer.random_interval_length_tick
preferences.title: Maximum length of the random time interval

preferences.name: timer.inactive_threshold_s
preferences.title: Minimum length of inactivity time to conclude user inactivity

preferences.name: timer.recently_active_threshold_s
preferences.title: Maximum length of activity time to conclude user has become active recently

preferences.name: delivery.mode.moment
preferences.title: Determines what is considered interruptible moment.

preferences.name: delivery.mode.silence_length.easy
preferences.title: Length of the easy rate limit mode in ticks.

preferences.name: delivery.mode.silence_length.strict
preferences.title: Length of the strict rate limit mode in ticks.

preferences.name: delivery.mode.observ_only
preferences.title: Whether or not only the observation should happen.

preferences.name: logger.periodic_log_period
preferences.title: How often periodic log info is reported.

preferences.name: feature_report.log_period
preferences.title: How often the feature status has to be reported.

preferences.name: experiment.default_delMode_weights
preferences.title: Weights based on which the user is randomly put into an experimental mode

preferences.name: experiment.name
preferences.title: Name of the very deployed experiment.

preferences.name: experiment.obs1_length_tick
preferences.title: Length of the first observation period in the experiment.

preferences.name: experiment.intervention_length_tick
preferences.title: Length of the intervention period in the experiment.

preferences.name: experiment.obs2_length_tick
preferences.title: Length of the second observation period in the experiment.

preferences.name: route.coefficient
preferences.title: Coefficient that scales the triggering behavior thresholds

preferences.name: sender.resend_period
preferences.title: How often the sender should retry sending the queued messages

preferences.name: sender.queue_quota
preferences.title: The number of messages that can be stored in the queue before they start to drop.
